tweet: The U.S. cannot even ban weed - after 70 years of trying. How can a country ban the use of privacy coins like Monero or Apollo, when used on truly distributed exchanges. Banning the invisible, used by the anonymous. Wake up world! Crypto is the mythical Pandora's box come to life
This will be the year for privacy tokens - Apollo, Monero, Zcash, Etc., and Medical tokens - Docademic, Solve, etc. Mark my words.
